title: Super Raft Boat Together
description:
The world’s been flooded Why, you ask? No one knows But perhaps you’ll find clues during your perilous (FUN) journey to the (MYTHICAL?) Final Island. Loddlenaut
Team up with up to 3 friends in online or local co-op or play solo to tackle ever-changing roguelike runs through a wide variety of thrilling biomes . Select trinkets wisely to construct the overpowered build that will finally lead you and your crew to paradise! (Or to DOOM Most likely doom, let’s be honest.)
